CQ-E1.question: What kind of event was [Event]
CQ-E1.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?eventDescription
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:description ?eventDescription .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

CQ-E2.question: Why was [Event] organized?
CQ-E2.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?eventDescription
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:description ?eventDescription .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

CQ-E3.question: Which [Artist] performed at [Event] held at [Venue]?

CQ-E4.question: Which [Artist] performed during [Event]?

CQ-E5.question: Which [City] or [Country] hosted [Event]?

CQ-E6.question: Which [Venue] hosted [Event]?

CQ-E7.question: What role did television and media coverage play in [Event]?

CQ-E9.question: Which [Performance] at [Event] is considered iconic?

CQ-E10.question: Which [Song] did [Artist] perform at [Event]?
CQ-E10.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?workName; separator=", ") AS ?allWorkName)
WHERE {
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf ?event ;
    			 ex:isIconic ?isIconic .
    ?performance mm:performedWork ?work .
    ?performance schema:performer ?artist .
    ?work schema:name ?workName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
    FILTER(?artist = {musicgroup})
}

CQ-E11.question: When did [Artist] debut?,[Artist] debuted in [Year] with a performance or release in [City/Country].

CQ-E12.question: When and where was [Artist] formed?,[Artist] was formed in [Year] in [City/Country].
CQ-E12.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName ?foundingDate ?foundingLocation
WHERE {
    BIND ({musicgroup} as ?artist)
    ?artist a mm:MusicArtist .
    ?artist schema:foundingDate ?foundingDate .
    ?artist schema:foundingLocation ?foundingLocation .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
}

CQ-E12b.question: When and where was [Artist] born?,[Artist] was born in [Year] in [City/Country].

CQ-E13.question: Who were the members of [Artist]?

CQ-E14.question: Who were the solo artists that performed at [Event]?
CQ-E14.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?eventName (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?artistName; separator=", ") AS ?allPerformingArtists)
WHERE {
    ?performance a schema:Event, mm:LivePerformance ;
           schema:isPartOf ?event ;
           schema:performer ?artist .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?artist a schema:Person .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
}
GROUP BY ?eventName

CQ-E15.question: What [Genre] are associated with [Artist]?

CQ-E16.question: What enabled the global broadcast of [Event]?
CQ-E16.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?eventName ?enabler ?enablerLabel
WHERE {
    ?event ex:usedBroadcastInfrastructure|ex:wasBroadcastVia ?enabler .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    OPTIONAL { ?enabler rdfs:label ?lbl1 }
    OPTIONAL { ?enabler schema:name ?lbl2 }
    BIND(STRAFTER(STR(?enabler), "#") AS ?fallback)
    BIND(COALESCE(?lbl1, ?lbl2, ?fallback) AS ?enablerLabel)
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
}
ORDER BY ?enablerLabel

CQ-E17.question: What were the challenges in organizing [Event]?

CQ-E18.question: How did [Event] influence future benefit concerts?

CQ-E19.question: What were the reactions of the audience or media to [Artist]’s [Performance] at [Event]?

CQ-E20.question: How much money was raised by [Event]?,

CQ-E21.question: Which [Organization] archived the broadcast of [Event]?

CQ-E22.question: Which[Organization] failed to archive the broadcast of [Event]?
CQ-E22.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?eventName ?subBroadcastDescription ?broadcastCompanyName ?preserved
WHERE {
    BIND (  {event} as ?mainEvent)
    ?mainEvent schema:name ?eventName .
    ?mainEvent ex:hadBroadcast ?mainBroadcast .
    ?mainBroadcast schema:subEvent ?subBroadcast .
    ?subBroadcast schema:description ?subBroadcastDescription .
    ?subBroadcast schema:provider ?broadcastCompany .
    ?subBroadcast ex:wasBroadcastPreserved ?preserved .
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany schema:name ?broadcastCompanyName }
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany rdfs:label ?broadcastCompanyName }
    FILTER(?preserved = false)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?preserved)

CQ-E23.question: What is the preservation status of [Event] broadcasts at [Venue]?

CQ-E24.question: Why is [Artist]’s performance at [Event] considered iconic?

CQ-E27.question: What creative milestones defined [Artist]’s career after [Event]?
CQ-E27.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:CareerMilestones ;
           oa:hasTarget ?artist ;
           oa:hasBody ?fundraising .
    ?fundraising schema:citation ?url .
    ?fundraising schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
}

CQ-L4.question: What were the locations that hosted [Event]?

CQ-L5.question: What was the attendance at each venue of [Event]?

CQ-L6.question: How many satellites were used during [Event]’s broadcast?
CQ-L6.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription

CQ-L7.question: What was the global TV audience size for [Event]?

CQ-L8.question: When did [Event] take place?
CQ-L8.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?date
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?event schema:startDate ?date .
}

CQ-L9.question: Who founded [Event]?
CQ-L9.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?founderName
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?event schema:organizer ?founder .
    ?founder schema:name ?founderName .
}

CQ-L10.question: What was [Artist]’s full setlist at [Event]?
CQ-L10.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?song ?position
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
  ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
               schema:performer   ?artist ;
               schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
               ex:setList ?setlist .
  ?setlist schema:itemListElement ?listItem .
  ?listItem schema:item ?work .
  ?listItem schema:position ?position .
  ?work schema:name ?song .
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
ORDER BY ?position

CQ-L11.question: Which [Artist] song was the third in their [Event] setlist
CQ-L11.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?song ?position
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
    BIND (3 AS ?position)
  ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
               schema:performer   ?artist ;
               schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
               ex:setList ?setlist .
  ?setlist schema:itemListElement ?listItem .
  ?listItem schema:item ?work .
  ?listItem schema:position ?position .
  ?work schema:name ?song .
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
ORDER BY ?position

CQ-L14.question: Who were the founding members of [Artist]?

CQ-L15.question: What [Genre] influenced [Artist]’s music?
CQ-L15.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?genreName; separator=", ") AS ?earlyMusicInfluenceGenre)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {musicgroup} as ?artist)
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?artist mm:hasGenre ?genre .
  ?genre schema:name ?genreName .
}
GROUP BY ?artistName

CQ-L20.question: How many viewers watched [Event] globally?
CQ-L20.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?eventName ?audienceType ?viewerCount ?countryCount
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} as ?event)
    ?event ex:hadBroadcast ?broadcast .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast schema:audience ?audience .
    ?audience schema:audienceType ?audienceType .
    ?audience ex:countryCount ?countryCount .
    ?audience ex:viewerCount ?viewerCount .
}
